activities: C3 Energy provides a family of smart grid analytics software as a service (SaaS) solutions for energy companies.  C3 Energy receives and processes information in accordance with its customers’ instructions for the purpose of providing its SaaS solutions to its customers. In most cases, the data C3 Energy receives is in electronic form and relates to its utility company customers and their end users. It may include personal information about C3 Energy’s customers’ employees, business contacts, clients, and any other individuals with whom C3 Energy’s customers have dealings.
contacttitle1: Senior Vice President, Products and Engineering
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer and client information (not manually processed)
